Source.Name: ftgl
Source.Summary: c++ library to simplify font rendering in openGL applications
Source.Description: FTGL is a free cross-platform Open Source C++ library that uses Freetype2 to simplify rendering fonts in OpenGL applications. FTGL supports bitmaps, pixmaps, texture maps, outlines, polygon mesh, and extruded polygon rendering modes.
